about.intro: Experienced Frontend Engineer with a strong background in building responsive, scalable, and user-centric web applications. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks such as React.js and Redux, with deep expertise in crafting complex UIs, optimizing performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
about.title: Software Developer
about.work: My work involves translating designs into efficient, reusable code, collaborating closely with backend teams, and focusing on seamless user experiences. I consistently apply best practices in UI/UX development, accessibility, and performance optimization.
about.skills: React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Tailwind CSS, REST APIs, WebSocket, Git, Docker.

header.quote1: Discipline is the bridge between goals and achievement.
header.quote2: Success is built on consistency, not just effort.
header.quote3: Stay disciplined, stay focused â€“ success will follow.

experiences.description: Worked on building responsive web applications using React.js and Redux. Focused on improving performance and user experience.

Contributed to the development of various gaming platforms, focusing on creating engaging and seamless user experiences. Key projects include Club Poker and Lottery Game, utilizing React.js, TypeScript, and backend integration.

Led and contributed to various software development projects across different industries. Key projects include Project Management Platform for Builders and Health Engagement Network, utilizing React.js, TypeScript, REST APIs, and Node.js.

footer.description: The website serves as a communication platform for various developers. In addition, it acts as a direct channel for interaction with clients and employers, ensuring seamless collaboration and engagement.
